LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodfocus.description: By forcibly manipulating the body’s stores of hemogen, the caster can enter a state of rapid meditation, regaining magical focus at the cost of hemogen.
LanguageData.VPEH_BloodRite.description: Creates a mote of hemogen that follows the caster, acting as an amplifier for magical aptitute based on the caster’s current hemogen level.
LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodstorm.description: Creates a downpour of blood, inflicting non-hemogenic individuals with bloodmist, causing intense vomiting. Vampires instead regenerate hemogen, and don’t gain magical load when casting any magic under the effects of bloodstorm.
